Munich and Porto, Munich and Naples, Porto and Valencia, Istanbul and Naples, Munich and Valencia, Munich and Venice, Istanbul and Valencia, Istanbul and Venice, Naples and Venice, Istanbul and Porto, Munich and Istanbul, Valencia and Naples.
